WHERE 1 = 1
AND (o.code_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryDto.searchStr},'%') OR o.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryDto.searchStr},'%') OR o.address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryDto.searchStr},'%') OR o.contacts LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryDto.searchStr},'%') OR o.telephone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryDto.searchStr},'%') )

ORDER BY convert(o.name USING gbk) COLLATE gbk_chinese_ci

mapper.select:
SELECT o.id AS id, o.org_type_id AS orgTypeId, o.code_no AS codeNo, o.name AS name, o.short_name AS shortName, o.address AS address, o.en_name AS enName, o.en_short_name AS enShortName, o.en_address AS enAddress, o.contacts AS contacts, o.telephone AS telephone, o.fax AS fax, o.fast_code AS fastCode, o.display_order AS displayOrder, o.memo AS memo, o.status AS status, o.time_version AS timeVersion FROM ctr_orgs o
${page.mysqlQueryCondition}

SELECT o.id AS id, o.org_type_id AS orgTypeId, o.code_no AS codeNo, o.nacao_id AS nacaoId, o.region_id AS regionId, r.name AS regionName, o.name AS name, o.short_name AS shortName, o.address AS address, o.en_name AS enName, o.en_short_name AS enShortName, o.en_address AS enAddress, o.contacts AS contacts, o.telephone AS telephone, o.fax AS fax, o.fast_code AS fastCode, o.display_order AS displayOrder, o.memo AS memo, o.status AS status FROM ctr_orgs o LEFT JOIN ctr_regions r ON r.id = o.region_id WHERE 1=1 AND o.id IN ( SELECT cor.child_id FROM ctr_org_relations AS cor WHERE cor.parent_id = #{parentId} )

SELECT o.id AS id, o.org_type_id AS orgTypeId, o.code_no AS codeNo, o.nacao_id AS nacaoId, o.region_id AS regionId, o.name AS name, o.short_name AS shortName, o.address AS address, o.en_name AS enName, o.en_short_name AS enShortName, o.en_address AS enAddress, o.web_url AS webUrl, o.contacts AS contacts, o.telephone AS telephone, o.fax AS fax, o.fast_code AS fastCode, o.display_order AS displayOrder, o.memo AS memo, o.status AS status FROM ctr_orgs o WHERE 1=1 AND o.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE ctr_orgs SET nacao_id = #{nacaoId}, region_id = #{regionId}, name = #{name}, short_name = #{shortName}, address = #{address}, en_name = #{enName}, en_short_name = #{enShortName}, en_address = #{enAddress}, web_url = #{webUrl}, contacts = #{contacts}, telephone = #{telephone}, fax = #{fax}, fast_code = #{fastCode}, display_order = #{displayOrder}, memo = #{memo}, status=#{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ctr_orgs ( id, org_type_id, code_no, nacao_id, region_id, name, short_name, address, en_name, en_short_name, en_address, web_url, contacts, telephone, fax, fast_code, display_order, memo, status, time_version ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orgTypeId}, #{codeNo}, #{nacaoId}, #{regionId}, #{name}, #{shortName}, #{address}, #{enName}, #{enShortName}, #{enAddress}, #{webUrl}, #{contacts}, #{telephone}, #{fax}, #{fastCode}, #{displayOrder}, #{memo}, #{status}, NOW() )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ctr_orgs WHERE 1=1 AND id=#{id}
DELETE FROM ctr_org_relations WHERE 1=1 AND parent_id=#{id}
DELETE FROM ctr_org_relations WHERE child_id = #{queryDto.childId} AND parent_id = #{queryDto.parentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ctr_org_relations ( id, parent_id, child_id, time_version ) VALUES( #{id}, #{parentId}, #{childId}, NOW() )
